00024 #include <iostream>
00025 #include "vhdABTTree.h"
00026 #include "vhdSceneConverterABTTree.h"

00030 
00031 #define NB_OBJECTS 3202
00032 
00033 unsigned int g_uiNumberOfVisibleLeaf=0;
00034 
00035 void 
00036 _ABTTreeVisit(unsigned int uiCurrentPos, unsigned int uiIndex, const vhdAxisAlignedBox &bbox)
00037 {
00038         //the leaf is visible
00039         std::cout << "Leaf at Position            : " << uiCurrentPos << std::endl;
00040         std::cout << "Leaf Index                  : " << uiIndex  << std::endl;
00041         std::cout << "Lead ID                     : "; 
00042         //loop
00043         vhdSceneConverterABTTree::ListAABB::iterator it = vhdSceneConverterABTTree::getSingleton().mapNodeChild[uiCurrentPos].listAABB.begin();
00044         std::cout << it->strPath;
00045         ++it;
00046         for ( it; it!= vhdSceneConverterABTTree::getSingleton().mapNodeChild[uiCurrentPos].listAABB.end(); ++it)
00047         {
00048                 std::cout << " , " << it->strPath;
00049         }
00050         std::cout << std::endl << std::endl;
00051         
00052         g_uiNumberOfVisibleLeaf+=(unsigned int) vhdSceneConverterABTTree::getSingleton().mapNodeChild[uiCurrentPos].listAABB.size();
00053 }

00056 bool _ABTTreeIsVisibleVisit (const vhdAxisAlignedBox &bbox)
00057 {
00058         //In real world, you will test if the bbox is contains in your view of interest
00059         return true;
00060 }
00061 
00062 bool _ABTTreeIsVisibleVisitRandom (const vhdAxisAlignedBox &bbox)
00063 {
00064 
00065         //assure some parsing
00066         static unsigned int uiAss(0);
00067         if (++uiAss%10 == 0)
00068         {
00069                 return false;
00070         }
00071         return true;
00072 }
00073 
00074 vhdSceneConverterABTTree singl;
00075 int main()
00076 {
00077         vhdABTTree *pABTTree = new vhdABTTree();
00078 
00079         vhdSceneConverterABTTree::vhdSceneABTTreeNode node;
00080         
00081         
00082         //we build the number of object we would like to try!
00083         unsigned int i(0);
00084         for ( i ; i < NB_OBJECTS ; ++i )
00085         {
00086                 vhdAxisAlignedBox axis(i*100, i*100,i*100,i*100+50,i*100+50,i*100+50);
00087                 char buf[256];
00088                 sprintf(buf,"%d",i);
00089                 std::string str=std::string("Leaf Id ")+std::string(buf);
00090 
00091                 node.listAABB.push_back(vhdSceneConverterABTTree::NodeChildStruct(axis,str));
00092         }
00093         vhdSceneConverterABTTree::getSingleton().pDataRootNode = &node;
00094         
00095         
00096         pABTTree->create(NB_OBJECTS);
00097         pABTTree->funcIsVisible = _ABTTreeIsVisibleVisit;
00098         pABTTree->funcVisit = _ABTTreeVisit;
00099 
00100         std::cout << std::endl << std::endl << std::endl << std::endl;
00101         std::cout << "Complete Search" << std::endl << std::endl;
00102         g_uiNumberOfVisibleLeaf=0;
00103         pABTTree->traversal();
00104         std::cout << std::endl << "Complete Search: number of leaves visited " << g_uiNumberOfVisibleLeaf << std::endl << std::endl << std::endl;
00105 
00106         std::cout << std::endl << std::endl << std::endl << std::endl;
00107         std::cout << "Random Search" << std::endl << std::endl;
00108         //we try the random isVisible Routine
00109         pABTTree->funcIsVisible = _ABTTreeIsVisibleVisitRandom;
00110         g_uiNumberOfVisibleLeaf=0;
00111         pABTTree->traversal();
00112         std::cout << std::endl << "Random Search : number of leaves visited " << g_uiNumberOfVisibleLeaf << std::endl << std::endl << std::endl;
00113 
00114         //put the complete search back
00115         pABTTree->funcIsVisible = _ABTTreeIsVisibleVisit;
00116         std::cout << std::endl << std::endl << std::endl << std::endl;
00117         std::cout << "Complete Search" << std::endl << std::endl;
00118         g_uiNumberOfVisibleLeaf=0;
00119         pABTTree->traversal();
00120         std::cout << std::endl << "Complete Search: Number of Leaves Visited " << g_uiNumberOfVisibleLeaf << std::endl << std::endl << std::endl;
00121 
00122 
00123         pABTTree->destroy();
00124         delete pABTTree;
00125 }
